text: Hi Its [redacted_name] with a reminder and exclusive invite to our Open House Thursday October 17th. Our East location will be from 10am-2pm and our Dixie location 4pm-7pm. Join us for giveaways, raffles, fabulous skincare and service discounts as well as wine and small bites. Plus one lucky winner will go home with a Louis Vuitton Carry-on. We can't wait to see you! ğŸ˜
